synopsis.text: Zen and Ai, two skilled warriors, find themselves on the frontlines of a battle against a formidable enemy: a horde of malevolent dinosaurs, once believed to be extinct, now wreaking havoc across Japan. As humanity's last hope, they join a specialized team of fighters known as Aizenborg, tasked with the daunting mission of fending off these prehistoric beasts. In a thrilling display of unity and strength, Zen and Ai combine their unique powers to transform into Izenbo, a colossal warrior, to challenge the menacing Satan Gottes and his relentless dinosaur army. This epic saga unfolds in a gripping four-episode series, masterfully edited into a single film for US audiences.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
